titleStmt.title: An Enquiry after Plain-dealing, who is said to have forsaken most parts of the world above a thousand years with a defence thereof against all its enemies and opposers, whether they be parasites, sycophants, pharisees, hypocrites, dissemblers, tale-bearers, whisperers, and the whole tribe of Judas.

An Enquiry after Plain-dealing, who is said to have forsaken most parts of the world above a thousand years with a defence thereof against all its enemies and opposers, whether they be parasites, sycophants, pharisees, hypocrites, dissemblers, tale-bearers, whisperers, and the whole tribe of Judas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.H. for the Author,

notesStmt.note: Running title: A defense of Plain-dealing.
